meanings.definition: The quality or state of being diligent and hardworking.
meanings.sent1: Her sedulousness in completing all her tasks on time impressed her boss.
meanings.sent2: His sedulousness in studying for the exam paid off with a high score.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's sedulousness in gathering nuts for winter was truly admirable.
meanings.sent4: The sedulousness of the ant colony in building their nest was a lesson in teamwork.
meanings.sent5: The gardener's sedulousness in tending to each plant individually resulted in a beautiful garden.

meanings.definition: The act of being meticulous and thorough in one's work.
meanings.sent1: The artist's sedulousness in every brushstroke brought life to the painting.
meanings.sent2: The detective's sedulousness in examining the evidence solved the case quickly.
meanings.sent3: The chef's sedulousness in measuring each ingredient precisely made the dish perfect.
meanings.sent4: The architect's sedulousness in planning every detail ensured the building's stability.
meanings.sent5: The student's sedulousness in editing the essay made it flawless and impressive.
